ModMetaData.name: Limited Letter Lots 有限信件槽
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
This mod changes the behavior of how letters are drawned in the game. It limits the number of letter slots to a fixed number, which can be configured in the mod settings. The extra letters will be bundled into a single letter button, so you won't miss any important messages. It's just to prevent pushing the higher region information away from screen.
Note: Because the bundle button is also taking a letter slot, so if you configure the number of letter slots to 2, when you receive 3 letters, you will start to see the bundle button which will contain the 2nd and the 3rd letters.
The support for 1.5 is not tested. It should work, but I don't want to switch to 1.5 for testing right now.
Idea came from Wengfrid (德国猎)
本模组修改了游戏中信件的显示方式。 它将信件槽的数量限制为一个固定的数字，可以在模组设置中进行配置。 额外的信件将被打包成一个单独的信件组按钮， 这样你就不会错过任何重要的信息。 这只是为了防止将更高优先级的信息推离屏幕。
注意：由于信件组按钮也占用一个信件槽， 因此如果你将信件槽数量配置为2，当你收到3封信件时， 你将看到信件组按钮，其中包含第2封和第3封信件。
1.5版本的支持没有经过测试。它应该没问题，我暂时还不想切换到1.5进行测试。
灵感来自于 Wengfrid (德国猎)。
